files.patch: @@ -102,2 +102,2 @@ - * it depends on. If you want them handled in the same way, you might - * choose to catch {@link RuntimeException}. If a stage is dependent + * it depends on. If they are to be handled in the same way, instead + * catch {@link RuntimeException}. If a stage is dependent @@ -153,3 +153,3 @@ - * happen-before that computation begins. And actions taken by - * a {@code CompletionStage} happen-before actions of any - * dependent stage subsequent to its completion. + * happen-before that computation begins. And actions taken by + * {@code CompletionStage x} happen-before actions of any + * dependent stage subsequent to {@code x}'s completion.
